• Complete Vanguard activities to earn Vanguard Ops Ranks. Completing multiple activities in a row grants additional progress.

• Earn Vanguard weapons at the end of matches, in engrams, or from focusing with more weapon perks as you complete up to 4 Rank resets in a Season.

• Each week, a different Nightfall weapon can be found by completing Nightfall activities; find Adept Nightfall weapons when completing Grandmaster Nightfall activities.

displayProperties.description:
The Ultimate edition includes two expansions: The Edge of Fate and Renegades. 

The Edge of Fate expansion includes a story campaign, new destination, new destination abilities, and access to the raid and epic raid. 

The Renegades expansion will feature a new story campaign, a new game mode, and access to the dungeon. 

This edition also includes the Dark Side Legends Pack, catalyst and ornament for the New Land Beyond Exotic, one secret stash delivered during each major update, an Exotic Sparrow, four Rewards Passes, and new weapons and armor to collect in each expansion.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Ultimate Edition

displayProperties.description:
The Year of Prophecy edition includes two expansions: The Edge of Fate and Renegades. 

The Edge of Fate expansion includes a story campaign, new destination, new destination abilities, and access to the raid and epic raid. 

The Renegades expansion will feature a new story campaign, a new game mode, and access to the dungeon.

This edition also includes four Rewards Passes and new weapons and armor to collect in each expansion.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy

displayProperties.description: Includes The Edge of Fate story campaign, a new destination, new destination abilities, access to the raid and epic raid, new weapons and armor to collect, and a Rewards Pass.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate

displayProperties.description:
The final shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on an adventure into the heart of the Traveler, harness the power of three new Super abilities, and finish the War of Light and Darkness. 

The Annual Pass edition includes The Final Shape story campaign, a new destination, three new Supers, new weapons and armor to collect, The Final Shape Dungeon Key, catalyst and ornament for the Tessellation Exotic, one Secret Stash delivered during each Episode, Exotic Sparrow, and all three Episodes in the year of The Final Shape.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape + Annual Pass

displayProperties.description: The Final Shape Dungeon Key provides access to two dungeons during Year 7.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape Dungeon Key

displayProperties.description:
Prevent the apocalypse by racing Emperor Calus to the edge of the solar system. 

Discover a new destination and master Strand, a new subclass.
displayProperties.name: Destiny 2: Lightfall

displayProperties.description: The Lightfall Dungeon Key provides access to two dungeons during Year 6.
displayProperties.name: Lightfall Dungeon Key

displayProperties.description:
Delve into Savathûn's twisted throne world to uncover the mystery of how she and her Lucent Brood stole the Light.

Learn the secrets required to craft all-new weapons, a new weapon archetype, and take back the Light.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

displayProperties.description: The Witch Queen Dungeon Key provides access to two dungeons: "Duality" and "Spire of the Watcher."
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen Dungeon Key

displayProperties.description: Xûr invites you to the shores of Eternity where your skill will be tested… and rewarded. Celebrate 30 years of Bungie with new content that pays homage to a legendary legacy of gaming.
displayProperties.name: Bungie 30th Anniversary Pack

displayProperties.description:
The Beyond Light Pack introduces over 15 Exotic weapons and armor to collect, the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid, as well as two Nightfalls: The Glassway and Proving Grounds. 

The Beyond Light campaign and Stasis subclass are free in Destiny 2 and do not require this pack.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light Pack

displayProperties.description:
The Shadowkeep Pack introduces over 15 Exotic weapons and armor to collect, the "Garden of Salvation" raid, "Pit of Heresy" dungeon, and Scarlet Keep Nightfall. 

The Shadowkeep campaign is free in Destiny 2 and does not require this pack.
displayProperties.name: Shadowkeep Pack

displayProperties.description: Upgrade your arsenal with the Forsaken Pack, which includes access to more than 20 Forsaken Exotic weapons, the "Shattered Throne" dungeon, and "Last Wish" raid. Owners also get 3 Forsaken Ciphers to instantly unlock any 3 Forsaken Exotic weapons of their choosing (raid and dungeon weapons excluded).
displayProperties.name: Forsaken Pack

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Defeat Nightmares throughout the solar system to cleanse this Essence. Lost Sector bosses grant the most efficient progress.

Nightmares defeated on the Moon grant no progress.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Pride

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Defeat Fallen on the Moon to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Isolation

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Defeat Hive on the Moon to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Fear

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete daily bounties from Eris Morn to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Anguish

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Collect resources, loot chests, and complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Despair

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Get Grenade Launcher final blows in Vanguard, Gambit, or Crucible playlists, and claim the Bound Manacle in the Gatehouse to cleanse this Essence. Defeating Guardians grants the most efficient progress.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Insanity

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Land final blows on the Moon with Supers, grenades, and melee and claim the Fangs of Shun'Gath in the World's Grave to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Rage

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Defeat Vex on the Moon, defeat combatants with Fusion Rifles, and recover Ehrath'Ur's Horned Wreath in the Catacombs to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Servitude

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon, defeat combatants with Machine Guns, and collect Ethereal Charms in the Temple of Crota to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Greed

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon, defeat combatants with Submachine Guns, and collect Withered Plumes in the Circle of Bones to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Obscurity

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon, defeat combatants with Sniper Rifles, and collect the Horned Wreath in the Chamber of Night to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Vanity

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon, defeat combatants with Hand Cannons, and collect the Necromantic Strand in the Hall of Wisdom to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Brutality

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon, defeat combatants with Swords, and recover Ralniks's Hatchet in Traitor's Ketch to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Jealousy

displayProperties.description:
Cleansing this Essence will grant a piece of gear.

Complete patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors across the Moon, defeat combatants with Auto Rifles, and collect the Captive Cord in the Lunar Battlegrounds to cleanse this Essence.
displayProperties.name: Essence of Failure

displayProperties.description: A mysterious, impossible horse. Starhorse's origins and motives are unknowable.
displayProperties.name: Starhorse

displayProperties.description:
Complete the following objectives in a single run of Dares of Eternity. Objectives will reset if not completed when the activity ends.

Get Pulse Rifle final blows or rapidly defeat combatants. Combatants rapidly defeated with Pulse Rifles grant the most efficient progress.

Complete the activity with a decent score.
displayProperties.name: Pulse of Combat

displayProperties.description:
Complete the following objectives in a single run of Dares of Eternity. Objectives will reset if not completed when the activity ends.

Get Auto Rifle final blows or rapidly defeat combatants. Combatants rapidly defeated with Auto Rifles grant the most efficient progress.

Complete the activity with a decent score.
displayProperties.name: 75M Sprint

displayProperties.description:
Complete the following objectives in a single run of Dares of Eternity. Objectives will reset if not completed when the activity ends.

Get Trace Rifle final blows or rapidly defeat combatants. Combatants rapidly defeated with Trace Rifles grant the most efficient progress.

Complete the activity with a decent score.
displayProperties.name: Laser Tag

displayProperties.description:
Complete the following objectives in a single run of Dares of Eternity. Objectives will reset if not completed when the activity ends. 

Defeat combatants with attached grenade abilities, defeat combatants with grenades, and complete the activity with an impressive score.
displayProperties.name: Sticky Situation

displayProperties.description:
Complete the following objectives in a single run of Dares of Eternity. Objectives will reset if not completed when the activity ends. 

Defeat combatants with grenade abilities or Grenade Launchers, rapidly defeat combatants, and complete the activity with an impressive score.
displayProperties.name: Pins Pulled

displayProperties.description:
Complete the following objectives in a single run of Dares of Eternity on Expert difficulty. Objectives will reset if not completed when the activity ends. 

Defeat combatants while using abilities of any type, defeat combatants while using Energy or Power weapons, and complete the activity with a incredible score.
displayProperties.name: Tools of the Trade
